code: export default function GetAvgRating(ratingArr){if((ratingArr===null||ratingArr===void 0?void 0:ratingArr.length)===0)return 0;const totalReviewCount=ratingArr===null||ratingArr===void 0?void 0:ratingArr.reduce((acc,curr)=>{acc+=curr.rating;return acc;},0);const multiplier=Math.pow(10,1);const avgReviewCount=Math.round(totalReviewCount/(ratingArr===null||ratingArr===void 0?void 0:ratingArr.length)*multiplier)/multiplier;return avgReviewCount;}
